P

promptForBool(String, String, String) - Static method in class lib.ConsoleIO
Generates a prompt that expects the user to enter one of two responses that will equate to a boolean value.
promptForByte(String, byte, byte) - Static method in class lib.ConsoleIO
Generates a prompt that expects a numeric input representing a byte value.
promptForChar(String, char, char) - Static method in class lib.ConsoleIO
Generates a prompt that expects a single character input representing a char value.
promptForDouble(String, double, double) - Static method in class lib.ConsoleIO
Generates a prompt that expects a numeric input representing a double value.
promptForFloat(String, float, float) - Static method in class lib.ConsoleIO
Generates a prompt that expects a numeric input representing a float value.
promptForInput(String, boolean) - Static method in class lib.ConsoleIO
Generates a prompt that allows the user to enter any response and returns the String.
promptForInt(String, int, int) - Static method in class lib.ConsoleIO
Generates a prompt that expects a numeric input representing an int value.
promptForLong(String, long, long) - Static method in class lib.ConsoleIO
Generates a prompt that expects a numeric input representing a long value.
promptForMenuSelection(String[], boolean) - Static method in class lib.ConsoleIO
Generates a console-based menu using the Strings in options as the menu items.
promptForShort(String, short, short) - Static method in class lib.ConsoleIO
Generates a prompt that expects a numeric input representing a short value.
